articles.author: Sam Blitz
articles.title: Jack Grealish hails Declan Rice on social media after West Ham star scores solo goal in Europe - Daily Mail
articles.description: Grealish hailed Declan Rice on social media after the West Ham midfielder scored a wondergoal in the Europa League, claiming the Hammers star should have a higher FIFA 22 pace rating.
articles.content:
Jack Grealish hailed Declan Rice on social media after the West Ham midfielder scored a wondergoal in the Europa League, claiming the Hammers star should have a higher FIFA 22 pace rating.
